title: ITV.Tour.de.France.2014.Stage.17.Highlights.PDTV.x264-NX
description:
ITV.Tour.de.France.2014.Stage.17.Highlights.PDTV.x264-NX

Wednesday 23rd July 2014 ITV4
7pm to 8pm Highlights

Highlights of stage 17 and the day after the longest stage of the race comes the shortest one, 125km between Saint-Gaudens and Saint-Lary Pla d'Adet. But with four mountain passes to traverse, today is quite possibly the hardest of the whole race. The tight elimination time will force the sprinters to push themselves to their limits all day in order to stay in the race, and with a summit finish up the HC Pla d'Adet, the action at the front is bound to be fierce. Presented by Gary Imlach with analysis from Chris Boardman, commentary by Phil Liggett and Paul Sherwen with Ned Boulting the reporter at the roadside.

I'm off on holiday on 26th July for one week so I won't be uploading the last 2 stages (stages 20 and 21) but I'll upload them a week later on 3rd August when I get back. Sorry about that.
